page.title: 09THE GOLF COURSE
page.content: Just off the main A.120 Dovercourt by-pass lies the only{golf course}in the area which is a popular form of {recreation}for visitors as well as locals.It has an{interesting past having been originally built for Officers stationed in the area during the First World War.After the war was over it was made into a proper golf club, and at the moment of writing has a total of{276 members}including one member who comes from Belgium, and the sister of the present Prime Minister Mrs. Thatcher. The secretary told us that the{9 hole course measures 2929 yards, and covers an area of 34 acres. We think it would be a good place to play for children. There are{junior members,}who enjoy playing.
